item.title: Simon add a quote by Marc Bekoff
item.description: "Let us remember that animals are not mere resources for human consumption. They are splendid beings in their own right, who have evolved alongside us as co-inheritors of all the beauty and abundance of life on this planet" -- Marc Bekoff

item.title: Simon add a quote by Colleen Patrick-Goudreau
item.description: "It's a pretty amazing to wake up every morning, knowing that every decision I make is to cause as little harm as possible. It's a pretty fantastic way to live." -- Colleen Patrick-Goudreau

item.title: Simon add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "We can't plead ignorance, only indifference. Those alive today are the generations that came to know better. We have the burden and the opportunity of living in the moment when the critique of factory farming broke into the popular consciousness. We are the ones of whom it will be fairly asked, What did you do when you learned the truth about eating animals?" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Simon add a quote by Pythagoras
item.description: "As long as Man continues to be the ruthless destroyer of lower living beings, he will never know health or peace. For as long as men massacre animals, they will kill each other. Indeed, he who sows the seed of murder and pain cannot reap joy and love." -- Pythagoras
